name: Get the list of transactional emails on the basis of allowed filters
fullName: Transactional/Email API#Get the list of transactional emails on the basis of allowed filters
descriptionHtml: This endpoint will show the list of emails for past 30 days by default. To retrieve emails before that time, please pass startDate and endDate in query filters.
statusMessage: Response has the required fields, Validate count field is a non-negative integer, Verify transactionalEmails array is present and has expected number of elements

testStage.statusMessage: Response has the required fields, Validate count field is a non-negative integer, Verify transactionalEmails array is present and has expected number of elements

Verify transactionalEmails array is present and has expected number of elements
